wikipedia_page.main: John Sidney Ash (1925 – 2014) was an English ornithologist. He had a strong interest in the avifauna from the Horn of Africa, in particular Somalia, Eritrea and Ethiopia.

response: * John Ash (Canadian politician) (1821–1886), Member of the Legislative Assembly for Comox riding in British Columbia, Canada
* John Ash (writer) (1948-2019), poet, writer and travel writer
* John Ash (MP for Totnes) (fl. 1420-1439), English politician
